snippet: Valérie Trierweiler, the partner of President François Hollande, said that she would drop plans to host a television program but would continue to work as a journalist.
abstract: Valerie Trierweiler, partner of French President Francois Hollande, says she will drop plans to host television program but will continue to work as journalist.
lead_paragraph: Valérie Trierweiler, the partner of President François Hollande, said that she would drop plans to host a television program but would continue to work as a journalist.

headline.main: France: President’s Partner Cancels Plans to Host TV Program
headline.print_headline: France: President’s Partner Cancels Plans to Host TV Program
